name: Escape The Room (itch)
description:
Escape The Room is a game for the "Mini Jam 1" game jam.

The game was made within 48 hours by an amateur developer.

There are only 5 levels, but I am completely open to making more levels and gameplay features after the game jam is over.

All levels were made in 128x128 and then scaled up to fit 512x512.

 (Said developer also ate a cookie in the process.)
